kesenamuth, janadhipathiwaranaye chanda wimasimata dina thunakata pera kolambaa nagara sabha pitiye pawathi awasana pracharaka raliye di bomba praharayakata hasu wu chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathungage dakunu asata barapathala hani sidu wiya. 1999 desambar 21 pawathi janadhipathiwaranayen chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga 51.12%ka chanda prathishathayak laba gath athara, eksath jathika pakshaye apekshaka ranil wikramasinha laba gaththe 42.71%k pamani.
